examples: The market had vibrant yellow lemons on display.
Many lanes are desecrated with yellow lines.
She drew a yellow sun on the corner of the paper.
They planted yellow flowers in the garden to attract bees.
We finally settled on a soft yellow for the kitchen walls.
words.defineEn: having the color of lemons or the sun
words.defineVi: có màu chanh hoặc mặt trời

examples: After months of anticipation, Amber finally gathered the courage to make the first move and ask Joe out on a date.
Amber, what did you do to your face?
You guys remember Amber from our tuatara video?
Like many taxidermists, Amber entered the trade as a curious amateur.
I pulled Amber aside.
words.defineEn: having a yellowish-brown color
words.defineVi: có màu vàng nâu

examples: The hot summer day made it unbearable for David to wear clothes, so he decided to spend the afternoon in the buff, sunbathing in his backyard.
After a long day at work, Emma likes to unwind by spending some time in the buff, enjoying the freedom of being naked in the comfort of her own home.
Hopefully they'll buff out.
I am a history buff.
-I want a buff one, man.
words.defineEn: having a light beige color
words.defineVi: có màu be nhạt

examples: After the meeting, John looked like the cat that swallowed the canary.
After winning the game, he grinned like the cat that got the canary.
When he asked her on a date she was like the cat that ate the canary.
Amazon is very much the canary in the coal mine.
Like the classic canary in the coal mine, sentinel species help predict risks to humans, serving as an early warning of potential danger.
words.defineEn: having the color of a canary; of a light to moderate yellow
words.defineVi: có màu của chim hoàng yến; có màu vàng nhạt đến trung bình

examples: I added citron to my detox regimen for its cleansing properties.
Mixing citron juice with honey and warm water makes a soothing morning drink.
Citron isn't surprised.
Citron says other gaming apps like TeamSpeak use outdated technology while services like Skype or WhatsApp didn't cater to the video game market.
The Citron narrative is going to change and have a pivot.
words.defineEn: a vibrant, yellow-green color reminiscent of the color of the citron fruit
words.defineVi: một màu xanh vàng rực rỡ gợi nhớ đến màu của quả chanh

words.defineEn: a yellowish-orange gemstone color that is often associated with the color of the gemstone citrine
words.defineVi: một màu đá quý màu vàng cam thường được kết hợp với màu của đá quý citrine

words.defineEn: of the color intermediate between green and orange in the color spectrum; of something resembling the color of an egg yolk
words.defineVi: của màu trung gian giữa xanh lục và da cam trong quang phổ màu; của một cái gì đó giống như màu của lòng đỏ trứng

examples: Prospectors have hit gold.
To work gold.
Some high-end restaurants use gold leaf as a garnish for desserts and other dishes.
Tickets for the concert are like gold dust.
This information is as good as gold.
words.defineEn: having a deep yellow color or the color of gold
words.defineVi: có màu vàng đậm hoặc màu vàng

examples: In the school garden, the students proudly harvested the maize they had planted.
As the summer sun set, a family gathered in the backyard, grilling maize skewers alongside juicy grilled meats.
The gods, the lords, and the maize were buried in the underworld.
These mountains of maize inspired numerous corn concoctions.
A new race of humans was created, made from maize.
words.defineEn: a strong yellow color
words.defineVi: một màu vàng mạnh mẽ

examples: She tossed mustard sprouts into her salad for a crunchy texture and a hint of spiciness.
She spread a dollop of mustard on her sandwich for an extra kick.
He mixed powdered mustard with other herbs to create a flavorful rub for his grilled meats.
The ham was glazed with a mixture of brown sugar and mustard.
You can't have a classic hot dog without a generous squeeze of mustard on top.
words.defineEn: having a dull, dark yellow color
words.defineVi: có màu vàng xỉn, sẫm

examples: He shared a juicy peach with his friend during a picnic in the park.
Peaches are packed with antioxidants that help protect your body against harmful free radicals.
They spent the afternoon pitting the peaches for their summer jam.
I bit into a ripe peach and enjoyed its sweet flesh.
Sarah made a refreshing peach iced tea to beat the summer heat.
words.defineEn: having a moderate color between pink and orange
words.defineVi: có màu vừa phải giữa hồng và cam

examples: You cannot make bricks without straw.
Sarah enjoyed her milkshake in a thick glass with a straw.
I would have even grasped at the straw of anti-depressants.
We drew straws for who had to make dinner, and I lost.
If you pay close attention to people's behavior and actions, you can often predict their intentions, as a straw will show which way the wind blows.
words.defineEn: of a pale yellow color like straw; straw-colored
words.defineVi: có màu vàng nhạt như rơm; màu rơm

words.defineEn: a bright, sunny yellow color that resembles the vibrant hue of the sun
words.defineVi: một màu vàng nắng tươi sáng giống như màu sắc rực rỡ của mặt trời

words.defineEn: a pale yellow color that resembles the hue of ripe bananas
words.defineVi: một màu vàng nhạt giống như màu của chuối chín

words.defineEn: a vibrant and warm hue that resembles the color of pure gold
words.defineVi: một màu sắc rực rỡ và ấm áp giống như màu của vàng nguyên chất

examples: Is that Jasmine?
The spathe releases a jasmine smell.
He eventually got his wish in Jasmine.
Hi, I'm Jasmine.
Hey Jasmine, do you smell that?
words.defineEn: a soft, delicate, and pale yellow color reminiscent of the fragrant flowers of the jasmine plant
words.defineVi: một màu vàng nhạt, mềm mại và tinh tế gợi nhớ đến những bông hoa thơm của cây hoa nhài

words.defineEn: a bright and zesty green color resembling the vibrant color of the tropical lime fruit
words.defineVi: một màu xanh tươi sáng và tươi mát giống như màu sắc rực rỡ của trái chanh nhiệt đới

words.defineEn: a warm, yellow-orange color resembling the hue of the flowering goldenrod plant
words.defineVi: một màu vàng cam ấm áp giống như màu của cây thanh vàng đang nở hoa

words.defineEn: a bright, vivid yellow-green color that is often used to represent a vibrant and energetic aesthetic
words.defineVi: một màu vàng xanh tươi sáng, sống động thường được sử dụng để thể hiện tính thẩm mỹ sôi nổi và tràn đầy năng lượng

examples: She mixed diced mango, jalapeños, and lime juice to create a refreshing salsa.
You can tell a mango is ripe when it gives a slight squeeze and yields to gentle pressure.
Including mangoes in your diet can provide a boost of vitamins and antioxidants.
Paying nine bucks for 200g of dried mango is highway robbery.
Creating a homemade face mask using mango can be a cost-effective option for skincare.
words.defineEn: a warm, rich, and vibrant orange-yellow color reminiscent of the ripe fruit it is named after
words.defineVi: một màu vàng cam ấm áp, phong phú và rực rỡ gợi nhớ đến loại trái cây chín mà nó được đặt theo tên

examples: The couple parted brass rags over their children last night.
The lazy employee's work was not worth a brass farthing, and he was eventually fired for his lack of effort.
The entrepreneur saw an opportunity in the waste management industry, knowing that where there is muck there is brass.
I'm not sure why they were parting brass rags with each other, but it was clear that they were not getting along.
The situation was so serious that after a few polite exchanges they quickly got down to brass tacks.
words.defineEn: a metallic yellowish-brown color resembling the alloy of copper and zinc
words.defineVi: một màu nâu vàng kim loại giống như hợp kim của đồng và kẽm

words.defineEn: a pale, light brown color that resembles the color of sand found in desert landscapes
words.defineVi: một màu nâu nhạt, nhạt giống như màu của cát được tìm thấy trong phong cảnh sa mạc

words.defineEn: yellow tinged with crimson
words.defineVi: màu vàng nhuốm màu đỏ thẫm

examples: In the school garden, the students proudly harvested the maize they had planted.
As the summer sun set, a family gathered in the backyard, grilling maize skewers alongside juicy grilled meats.
The gods, the lords, and the maize were buried in the underworld.
These mountains of maize inspired numerous corn concoctions.
A new race of humans was created, made from maize.
words.defineEn: a strong yellow color
words.defineVi: một màu vàng mạnh mẽ

words.defineEn: a yellowish-green color, resembling the color of the leaves of the honeysuckle plant, often associated with growth, harmony, and vitality
words.defineVi: màu xanh vàng, giống như màu lá của cây kim ngân hoa, thường liên quan đến sự phát triển, hài hòa và sức sống

examples: The market had vibrant yellow lemons on display.
Lemon chicken is a flavorful dish that combines the juiciness of chicken with the tanginess of lemons.
He added a squeeze of lemon to his fish tacos for a citrusy twist.
He zests the lemon over the pasta to give it a refreshing flavor.
He squeezed fresh lemon juice into his water, enjoying the tangy taste of the citrus.
words.defineEn: having a bright yellow color like the lemon fruit
words.defineVi: có màu vàng tươi như quả chanh
